MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in theTD9  postcode area of Hawick. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 07.01am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigate a broken overhead line near Whitehaugh and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:57am on Wednesday, 07 April 2021
